data.summary_suggestion: Create and send event notification to TPP
data.description_suggestion: Creates and sends an event notification to a Third Party Provider (TPP) regarding resource updates. This operation accepts event notification data including the event subject, resource links, and notification metadata. The request requires TPP OAuth2 authentication. Returns confirmation of the notification creation with status details. The operation triggers event delivery to the subscribed TPP endpoint and updates the event notification state in the system.
